title: inputBaseN
name: inputBaseN
description:
Converts string, using the base specified by radix, to an
        integer. For example: #InputBaseN("3ff",16)#

arguments.name: string
arguments.description: String that represents a number, in the base specified by radix.

arguments.name: radix
arguments.description: Base of the number represented by string, in the range 2-36.
